node.excerpt: Sometimes I can't find a way to write concisely and coherently, but when I run out of ideas, I can always trust my thought flow to write whatever comes to mind and fight writer's block. Sometimes it ends up being the same thing over and over, andâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Empty Corridors
frontmatter.description: Frustration when I realized I was counting.

node.excerpt: I never imagined the most embarrassing moment of my year would be reading a poem out loud because up to that moment, I never thought of releasing them to the world just yet. But as I was shaking nervously when I decided I'd do it, I realized that Iâ€¦

frontmatter.title: If It Happens At All
frontmatter.description: Here's to still hoping a bit.

node.excerpt: I went through the years "milestoning" each age as if something magical would happen and change everything. Ever since I started writing, I wanted to create something to sum up my whole year in some way. At 18, I wrote that I wouldn't act my age, butâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Checkboxes
frontmatter.description: Still daydreaming a lot, still swearing in thoughts.

node.excerpt: I've read a lot about how repetition is a magic element in songwriting, but it's hard to tell if you're overdoing it. Trying to diversify what I'm writing, I end up getting stuck with a lot of wordy pieces that wouldn't fit a melody if I begged themâ€¦

"Where do you see yourself in ten years?" is the kind of question that gives me serious goosebumps. I hate to be reminded that everything will keep changing, and they will in the months to come. However, the past is also tough to face if you're notâ€¦

frontmatter.title: We Don't Talk About Future
frontmatter.description: The only safe bet is someday I'm gonna be gone.

node.excerpt: Convincing yourself that some things wouldn't work out is hard. I wrote this one in an attempt to believe it, hiding the predictable title choice behind an acronym. YDWML! Feeling too much and too fast  Itâ€™s not healthy for me  Not healthy for you ifâ€¦

frontmatter.title: YDWML!
frontmatter.description: Not healthy for me, not healthy for you if you knew.

messages.title: Poems With Choruses
messages.description: Documenting life as I try to fit it in the lyrics of a song.
messages.author: Robson Junior
